voogasalad.util.spriteanimation.colorchange

Class AbstractColorChanger

  • java.lang.Object
    • voogasalad.util.spriteanimation.colorchange.AbstractColorChanger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BFSColorChanger

    public abstract class AbstractColorChanger
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to change the color of an image, with particular emphasis on background colors.
    Author:
    Rhondu Smithwick

        public AbstractColorChanger(javafx.scene.image.Image image,
                            double x,
                            double y,
                            javafx.scene.paint.Color newColor)
        Sole constructor.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to modify
        x - the x-value of the pixel to start at (where oldColor will be gotten)
        y - the y-value fo the pixel to start at (where oldColor will be gotten from)
        newColor - the color to change to
